Search.Name: Search

Suggest.Name: Suggest

UploadDocuments.Name: UploadDocuments

Count.Documentation: // The number of hits that contain the facet value in the specified facet field.

BucketInfo.Documentation: // A container for the calculated facet values and counts.

Buckets.Documentation: // A list of the calculated facet values and counts.

DocumentServiceWarning.Documentation:
// A warning returned by the document service when an issue is discovered while
// processing an upload request.

Message.Documentation: // The description for a warning returned by the document service.

FieldStats.Documentation: // The statistics for a field calculated in the request.

Count.Documentation:
// The number of documents that contain a value in the specified field in the
// result set.

Missing.Documentation:
// The number of documents that do not contain a value in the specified field
// in the result set.

Stddev.Documentation:
// The standard deviation of the values in the specified field in the result
// set.

Sum.Documentation:
// The sum of the field values across the documents in the result set. null
// for date fields.

SumOfSquares.Documentation: // The sum of all field values in the result set squared.

Hit.Documentation: // Information about a document that matches the search request.

Exprs.Documentation: // The expressions returned from a document that matches the search request.

Fields.Documentation: // The fields returned from a document that matches the search request.

Highlights.Documentation: // The highlights returned from a document that matches the search request.

Id.Documentation: // The document ID of a document that matches the search request.

Hits.Documentation: // The collection of documents that match the search request.

Cursor.Documentation:
// A cursor that can be used to retrieve the next set of matching documents
// when you want to page through a large result set.

Found.Documentation: // The total number of documents that match the search request.

Hit.Documentation: // A document that matches the search request.

Start.Documentation: // The index of the first matching document.

SearchInput.Documentation: // Container for the parameters to the Search request.

Size.Documentation: // Specifies the maximum number of search hits to include in the response.

SearchOutput.Documentation:
// The result of a Search request. Contains the documents that match the specified
// search criteria and any requested fields, highlights, and facet information.

Hits.Documentation: // The documents that match the search criteria.

Status.Documentation: // The status information returned for the search request.

SearchStatus.Documentation:
// Contains the resource id (rid) and the time it took to process the request
// (timems).

Rid.Documentation: // The encrypted resource ID for the request.

Timems.Documentation: // How long it took to process the request, in milliseconds.

Stats.Documentation: // The statistics calculated in the request.

SuggestInput.Documentation: // Container for the parameters to the Suggest request.

Query.Documentation: // Specifies the string for which you want to get suggestions.

Size.Documentation: // Specifies the maximum number of suggestions to return.

Suggester.Documentation: // Specifies the name of the suggester to use to find suggested matches.

Ref.Documentation: // Specifies the string for which you want to get suggestions.
// Specifies the name of the suggester to use to find suggested matches.

SuggestModel.Documentation: // Container for the suggestion information returned in a SuggestResponse.

Found.Documentation: // The number of documents that were found to match the query string.

Query.Documentation: // The query string specified in the suggest request.

Suggestions.Documentation: // The documents that match the query string.

SuggestOutput.Documentation: // Contains the response to a Suggest request.

Status.Documentation:
// The status of a SuggestRequest. Contains the resource ID (rid) and how long
// it took to process the request (timems).

Suggest.Documentation: // Container for the matching search suggestion information.

SuggestStatus.Documentation:
// Contains the resource id (rid) and the time it took to process the request
// (timems).

Rid.Documentation: // The encrypted resource ID for the request.

Timems.Documentation: // How long it took to process the request, in milliseconds.

SuggestionMatch.Documentation: // An autocomplete suggestion that matches the query string specified in a SuggestRequest.

Id.Documentation: // The document ID of the suggested document.

Score.Documentation: // The relevance score of a suggested match.

Suggestion.Documentation: // The string that matches the query string specified in the SuggestRequest.

UploadDocumentsInput.Documentation: // Container for the parameters to the UploadDocuments request.

Documents.Documentation: // A batch of documents formatted in JSON or HTML.

Ref.Documentation: // A batch of documents formatted in JSON or HTML.

UploadDocumentsOutput.Documentation: // Contains the response to an UploadDocuments request.

Adds.Documentation: // The number of documents that were added to the search domain.

Deletes.Documentation: // The number of documents that were deleted from the search domain.

Warnings.Documentation: // Any warnings returned by the document service about the documents being uploaded.
